PORT_CHANNEL_TEST.desc: Configure a member port in PORT_CHANNEL table.

PORTCHANNEL_INTERFACE_IP_ADDR_TEST.desc: Configure IP address on PORTCHANNEL_INTERFACE table.

PORTCHANNEL_INTERFACE_IP_ADDR_ON_NON_EXI.desc: Configure IP address on a non existent PortChannel.

PORTCHANNEL_MEMBER_WITH_NON_EXIST_PORTCH.desc: Configure PortChannel in PORTCHANNEL_MEMEBER table which does not exist in PORTCHANNEL table.

PORTCHANNEL_MEMBER_WITH_NON_EXIST_PORT.desc: Configure Port in PORTCHANNEL_MEMEBER table which does not exist in PORT table.
